properties.title: City Lounge
properties.abstract: Enter the largest outdoor living room in Switzerland! The idea for the unusual project of a public «city lounge» came from the architect Carlos Martinez and the multimedia artist Pipilotti Rist.
properties.description: This art object transformed the «Bleicheli-Quartier» into a playful relaxation and business oasis, accessible round the clock. It invites you to pass the time and offers you space for encounters. Just like in a lounge, a red carpet is spread out with hanging, swinging lights above it, which bathe the quarter in a diverse discretely changing lighting atmosphere.
properties.name: St.Gallen-Bodensee Tourismus
